comment.author: 51624762@N02
comment._content: Would they have put this Starfish back!? Probably not if it was being kept for a specimen collection and I understand this,as specimens are critical for research. However, I am glad that   we the public,especially sports enthusiasts, have  become more of a catch and release nation! The use of cameras and sites like flickr have truly saved us from using up our precious resources in nature by photographing our trophies rather than mounting the actual "catch"! Happy holidays...~Terrie~

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51624762@N02] Thank you for your comment, Terrie! With increasing discoveries from Smithsonian's Field Book Project, we'll contribute to The Commons as often as we can. Check back soon! We appreciate your continued interest in Smithsonian photography. Happy holidays to you, Terrie. Sincerely, Susannah Smithsonian Institution Archives
